com.k2.FilesystemEntityManager

Class FemObjectConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.k2.FilesystemEntityManager.FemObjectConfig

  • public class FemObjectConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines The storage configuration for a specific class
    Author:
    simon

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configure()
      Update the file system entity manager with this configuration
      FemDataFormat dataFormat()
      Get the data format for this class
      FemObjectConfig dataFormat(FemDataFormat dataFormat)
      Set the data format in which the instance data will be written to the file system

      Get the data structure for storage of object instance data

      Set the data structure for storage of object instance data

      Get the repository alias in which this classes instance data is stored
      FemObjectConfig repository(java.lang.String alias)
      Set the alias of the repository in which this classes instance data is stored
      java.lang.String resourcePath()
      Get the resource path
      FemObjectConfig resourcePath(java.lang.String resourcePath)
      Set the classes resource path within the repository The resource path is relative to the repository location so if the given resource path starts with the file separator it is removed.

      • resourcePath

        public FemObjectConfig resourcePath(java.lang.String resourcePath)
        Set the classes resource path within the repository The resource path is relative to the repository location so if the given resource path starts with the file separator it is removed.
        Parameters:
        resourcePath - The new resource path in the repository
        Returns:
        This storage configuration for method chaining

        Returns:
